downloadTitle: .NET Rocks! - Smart Client Panel at TechEd 2008
downloadDescription: Carl and Richard interview Glenn Block, Steve Lasker, and Tim Huckaby on the state of the Smart Client.
detailsSection: Glenn Block, Steve Lasker and Tim Huckaby talked about the current state of the Smart Client at TechEd 2008.
systemRequirementsSection: Presentations are played using the Microsoft Windows Media Player.
installInstructionSection:
- Select "Save this Program to Disk" to copy the download to your machine for installation at a later time.
- Once the file has been downloaded, execute it in order to extract the media file.
